page.title: 20WALTHAMSTOW NEWS.
page.content: We put together a local news review for the week ending 7/6/1985. News included a report on Walthamstow Carnival.This is an annual event supported by local businesses,oganisations and any groups who wish to join in.Floats are decorated and a parade takes place.One float was decorated to represent V.E. Day. Another report was on Walthamstow Marsh Centre whose Chairman has started a Save the Marshes Campaign.The marshes are north of the Ice Rink on the Lea Bridge Road. Leucha Rd. was mentioned in the next report as someone who lived there was a keen bird watcher and saw several rare birds such as Sparrow hawks, Nightingales,Robins,Greenfinches,Blue Tits and commoner birds as well.
